repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A composite manuscript containing:
The Vayiravamantiram (Indien 990a, U1).
Tiruvācakam satellite stanzas (Indien 990a, U2).
The Tiruvācakam (Indien 990a, U3).
The Nāṟkaraṇa Upatēcam (Indien 990b, U1). This is by another hand, on another type of leaves, which have been recut to fit the bundle.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (December 2020).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation. First folios damaged.

collation.desc: the front cover. Palm-leaf. 120 x 40 mm.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark in black ink: Indien 990 (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark sticker written in black ink: 8 (front cover, recto).
Tamil text partly covered by the shefmark sticker: ṭṭu (front cover, recto).
BnF shelfmark sticker: Indien 990 (back cover, verso).

binding.p: Original palm-leaf front cover. 120 x 40 mm. Original wood back cover (very thin). 125 x 40 mm.

acquisition.p: Deposit (1938) from École des Langues orientales.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See handwritten addition, f5r, no. 990.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
